item.description:
Join Kevin, Kristen, and Carlin for an afternoon and evening of friends and fun. They will provide hamburgers and hot dogs for the grill. You provide the sides, desserts, etc, and your beverage of choice. Bring a sweater or something warm in case the evening is cool. We will check out (break in?) the new patio and fire pit! Don't forget the marshmallows.

Directions available on request.
item.name: Spring House Party
